contacts.description: Stores information about individual contacts within the CRM system, including personal details and their relationship to companies, users, and leads.

contact_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the contact's owner or assigned user.

lead_id.description: Foreign key to the leads table, representing the lead that this contact originated from.

created_date.description: Date and time when the contact was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the contact was last updated

companies.description: Stores information about companies, including their name, industry, and other relevant details.

company_id.description: Unique identifier for each company

city.description: City where the company is located

state.description: State where the company is located

zip_code.description: Zip code of the company's location

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the company owner or assigned user.

lead_id.description: Foreign key to the leads table, representing the lead source for the company.

created_date.description: Date and time when the company was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the company was last updated

leads.description: Stores information about potential customers or leads in the CRM system.

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the user assigned to the lead.

lead_source_id.description: Foreign key to the lead_sources table, indicating the source of the lead.

lead_status_id.description: Foreign key to the lead_statuses table, indicating the current status of the lead.

lead_score_id.description: Foreign key to the lead_scores table, indicating the score of the lead.

description.description: A brief description or notes about the lead.

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead was last updated

opportunities.description: Stores information about sales opportunities, tracking potential deals from initiation to closure.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the primary contact for this opportunity.

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, representing the company associated with this opportunity.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the user responsible for this opportunity.

opportunity_source_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunity_sources table, representing the source of this opportunity (e.g., web, referral).

opportunity_stage_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunity_stages table, representing the current stage of this opportunity (e.g., prospecting, qualification).

opportunity_status_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunity_statuses table, representing the current status of this opportunity (e.g., open, won, lost).

opportunity_name.description: Name or brief description of the opportunity.

close_date.description: Expected close date of the opportunity.

probability.description: Probability of closing the opportunity (as a percentage).

created_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity was last updated.

deals.description: Stores information about sales deals or opportunities, tracking their progress and associated data.

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunities table

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the deal owner

deal_stage_id.description: Foreign key to the deal_stages table, representing the current stage of the deal

deal_pipeline_id.description: Foreign key to the deal_pipelines table, representing the pipeline the deal belongs to

deal_source_id.description: Foreign key to the deal_sources table, representing the source of the deal

expected_close_date.description: Date when the deal is expected to close

probability.description: Probability of closing the deal (as a percentage)

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal was last updated

tasks.description: Stores information about tasks associated with contacts, companies, deals, leads, and opportunities within the CRM system.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunities table

lead_id.description: Foreign key to the leads table

task_type_id.description: Foreign key to the task_types table

task_status_id.description: Foreign key to the task_statuses table

creator_user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating who created the task

subject.description: Subject or title of the task

due_date.description: Date and time when the task is due

is_completed.description: Flag indicating whether the task is completed (1 for true, 0 for false)

created_date.description: Date and time when the task was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the task was last updated

meetings.description: Stores information about scheduled meetings within the CRM system, including details about the meeting, participants, and related records.

organizer_user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who organized the meeting

meeting_type_id.description: Foreign key to the meeting_types table, indicating the type of meeting (e.g., phone call, in-person meeting)

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table, linking the meeting to a specific deal

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunities table, linking the meeting to a specific opportunity

lead_id.description: Foreign key to the leads table, linking the meeting to a specific lead

subject.description: Subject or title of the meeting

description.description: Detailed description of the meeting's purpose and agenda

start_time.description: Date and time when the meeting is scheduled to start

end_time.description: Date and time when the meeting is scheduled to end

location.description: Location where the meeting will take place

status.description: Status of the meeting (e.g., scheduled, completed, canceled)

created_date.description: Date and time when the meeting record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the meeting record was last updated

calls.description: Stores information about phone calls made within the CRM system, including details about the call, participants, and outcome.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who made the call

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, indicating the contact involved in the call

call_outcome_id.description: Foreign key to the call_outcomes table, indicating the outcome of the call

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table, indicating the deal related to the call

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunities table, indicating the opportunity related to the call

lead_id.description: Foreign key to the leads table, indicating the lead related to the call

call_start_time.description: Date and time when the call started

call_end_time.description: Date and time when the call ended

call_duration.description: Duration of the call in seconds

created_date.description: Date and time when the call record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the call record was last updated

emails.description: Stores information about emails sent within the CRM system, including content, sender, recipients, and status.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the sender of the email.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, indicating the primary recipient of the email. Can be null if the email was not directly sent to a contact.

email_template_id.description: Foreign key to the email_templates table, indicating the template used for the email. Can be null if no template was used.

email_campaign_id.description: Foreign key to the email_campaigns table, indicating the campaign the email belongs to. Can be null if the email was not part of a campaign.

status.description: Status of the email (e.g., sent, delivered, opened, failed)

sent_date.description: Date and time when the email was sent

created_date.description: Date and time when the email record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the email record was last updated

notes.description: Stores notes or comments associated with various entities in the CRM system.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating who created the note

note_text.description: The actual text content of the note

created_date.description: Date and time when the note was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the note was last updated

users.description: Stores information about users within the CRM system, including authentication details, roles, and personal information.

user_id.description: Unique identifier for each user

user_role_id.description: Foreign key to the user_roles table, defining the user's role

is_active.description: Indicates whether the user account is active

last_login.description: Date and time of the user's last login

created_date.description: Date and time when the user was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the user was last updated

pipelines.description: Stores information about sales pipelines, defining the stages and flow of opportunities.

description.description: Detailed description of the pipeline's purpose and process

is_active.description: Indicates whether the pipeline is currently active (1) or inactive (0)

created_date.description: Date and time when the pipeline was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the pipeline was last updated

campaigns.description: Stores information about marketing campaigns, including their type, status, name, budget, and target audience.

campaign_type_id.description: Foreign key to the campaign_types table, indicating the type of campaign (e.g., email, ad, social media)

campaign_status_id.description: Foreign key to the campaign_statuses table, indicating the current status of the campaign (e.g., planned, in progress, completed)

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user responsible for the campaign

target_audience.description: Description of the target audience for the campaign

created_date.description: Date and time when the campaign was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the campaign was last updated

activities.description: Stores information about various activities performed within the CRM system, such as calls, meetings, emails, and tasks.

activity_type_id.description: Foreign key to the activity_types table, indicating the type of activity (e.g., call, meeting)

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who performed the activity

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, indicating the contact associated with the activity

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, indicating the company associated with the activity

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table, indicating the deal associated with the activity

lead_id.description: Foreign key to the leads table, indicating the lead associated with the activity

subject.description: Subject or title of the activity

due_date.description: Date and time when the activity is due

status.description: Status of the activity (e.g., Open, Completed, Cancelled)

priority.description: Priority of the activity (e.g., High, Medium, Low)

created_date.description: Date and time when the activity was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the activity was last updated

products.description: Stores information about products offered within the CRM system.

product_category_id.description: Foreign key to the product_categories table

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit for the product

is_active.description: Indicates whether the product is currently active

created_date.description: Date and time when the product was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the product was last updated

quotes.description: Stores information about quotes generated for deals, including pricing, terms, and associated contacts and companies.

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the user who created the quote

quote_status_id.description: Foreign key to the quote_statuses table, representing the current status of the quote

subtotal.description: Subtotal amount of the quote before taxes and discounts

discount.description: Discount amount applied to the quote

tax.description: Tax amount applied to the quote

total.description: Total amount of the quote after taxes and discounts

terms_and_conditions.description: Terms and conditions associated with the quote

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the quote

created_date.description: Date and time when the quote was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the quote was last updated

invoices.description: Stores information about invoices generated within the CRM system, including details about the invoice amount, status, and associated entities.

quote_id.description: Foreign key to the quotes table, indicating the quote associated with this invoice.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, indicating the contact associated with this invoice.

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, indicating the company associated with this invoice.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who created this invoice.

invoice_status_id.description: Foreign key to the invoice_statuses table, indicating the current status of the invoice.

invoice_date.description: Date when the invoice was issued.

due_date.description: Date when the invoice is due.

subtotal.description: Subtotal amount of the invoice before taxes and discounts.

tax.description: Tax amount applied to the invoice.

total_amount.description: Total amount of the invoice after taxes and discounts.

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the invoice.

terms.description: Terms and conditions of the invoice.

created_date.description: Date and time when the invoice was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the invoice was last updated.

orders.description: Stores information about customer orders, including order details, customer information, and order status.

invoice_id.description: Foreign key to the invoices table

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the user who created the order

order_status_id.description: Foreign key to the order_statuses table

order_date.description: Date when the order was placed

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the order

created_date.description: Date and time when the order was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the order was last updated

subscriptions.description: Stores information about customer subscriptions, including plan details, status, and associated contacts/companies.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the contact associated with the subscription

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, representing the company associated with the subscription

subscription_plan_id.description: Foreign key to the subscription_plans table, representing the plan selected for the subscription

subscription_status_id.description: Foreign key to the subscription_statuses table, representing the current status of the subscription

end_date.description: Date when the subscription is scheduled to end

renewal_date.description: Date when the subscription is due for renewal

created_date.description: Date and time when the subscription was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the subscription was last updated

cases.description: Stores information about support cases or issues reported by contacts or companies.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the contact who reported the case

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, representing the company associated with the case

case_status_id.description: Foreign key to the case_statuses table, representing the current status of the case

case_type_id.description: Foreign key to the case_types table, representing the type of the case (e.g., bug report, feature request)

case_resolution_id.description: Foreign key to the case_resolutions table, representing the resolution of the case (e.g., resolved, closed)

product_id.description: Foreign key to the products table, representing the product associated with the case

subject.description: Subject or title of the case

priority.description: Priority of the case (e.g., High, Medium, Low)

assigned_to.description: User ID of the user assigned to the case

created_date.description: Date and time when the case was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the case was last updated

events.description: Stores information about events within the CRM system, such as meetings, calls, and other interactions. Tracks details like event type, associated user, campaign, and outcomes.

event_type_id.description: Foreign key to the event_types table, specifying the type of event

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user associated with the event

campaign_id.description: Foreign key to the campaigns table, linking the event to a specific marketing campaign

event_name.description: Name or title of the event

event_start_date.description: Date and time when the event is scheduled to start

event_end_date.description: Date and time when the event is scheduled to end

event_location.description: Location where the event takes place

event_status.description: Current status of the event (e.g., scheduled, completed, cancelled)

created_date.description: Date and time when the event was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the event was last updated

documents.description: Stores documents related to various entities within the CRM system, such as contacts, companies, or deals.

document_category_id.description: Foreign key to the document_categories table, specifying the type of document.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who uploaded the document.

file_name.description: The original file name of the document.

file_path.description: The path to the document on the file system or cloud storage.

file_size.description: The size of the document in bytes.

description.description: A brief description of the document.

created_date.description: Date and time when the document was uploaded.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the document was last updated.

tags.description: Stores tags or categories that can be associated with contacts, companies, or other entities within the CRM system.

description.description: A more detailed description of the tag's purpose or meaning.

created_date.description: Date and time when the tag was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the tag was last updated

notifications.description: Stores notifications for users within the CRM system, providing updates and alerts.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, identifying the recipient of the notification

related_object_id.description: Foreign key to the related object (e.g., lead_id, opportunity_id). Can be NULL if not related to a specific object.

related_object_type.description: Type of the related object (e.g., 'lead', 'opportunity', 'task').  Required if related_object_id is not NULL.

is_read.description: Flag indicating whether the notification has been read by the user

created_date.description: Date and time when the notification was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the notification was last updated

integrations.description: Stores information about integrations between the CRM system and other third-party applications or services. This table tracks which users have connected which integrations, along with relevant configuration details.

integration_id.description: Unique identifier for each integration instance

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating which user owns/configured the integration.

third_party_integration_id.description: Foreign key to the third_party_integrations table, identifying the type of integration (e.g., Mailchimp, Slack).

integration_name.description: A descriptive name for this specific integration instance (e.g., 'Marketing Mailchimp Connection').

api_key.description: API key or other authentication token required to connect to the third-party service.  May be encrypted.

configuration_data.description: JSON blob storing specific configuration settings for this integration.  Structure depends on the third-party service.

status.description: Status of the integration (e.g., 'active', 'inactive', 'pending', 'error').

last_sync_date.description: Date and time of the last successful synchronization with the third-party service.

created_date.description: Date and time when the integration was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the integration was last updated

webhooks.description: Stores information about webhooks configured within the CRM system, including the target URL, event subscriptions, and status.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who created the webhook.

target_url.description: The URL to which the webhook will send notifications.

event_type.description: The type of event that triggers the webhook (e.g., 'contact_created', 'deal_updated').

secret.description: A secret key used to sign the webhook payloads for security.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the webhook is currently active.

created_date.description: Date and time when the webhook was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the webhook was last updated

surveys.description: Stores information about surveys conducted, including details about the survey itself, the campaign it belongs to, and the user who created it.

campaign_id.description: Foreign key to the campaigns table, indicating the campaign this survey belongs to

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who created the survey

status.description: Status of the survey (e.g., draft, active, completed)

created_date.description: Date and time when the survey was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the survey was last updated

discounts.description: Stores information about discounts applied to products, customers, campaigns, quotes, or deals within the CRM system.

product_id.description: Foreign key to the products table, indicating the product to which the discount applies.

customer_id.description: Foreign key to the customers table, indicating the customer to which the discount applies.

campaign_id.description: Foreign key to the campaigns table, indicating the campaign to which the discount applies.

quote_id.description: Foreign key to the quotes table, indicating the quote to which the discount applies.

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table, indicating the deal to which the discount applies.

discount_name.description: Name or description of the discount

discount_percentage.description: The discount percentage to be applied.

start_date.description: The date the discount becomes active.

created_date.description: Date and time when the discount was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the discount was last updated

refunds.description: Stores information about refunds issued to customers, including the order, customer, invoice, refund amount, reason, and status.

order_id.description: Foreign key to the orders table, indicating the order associated with the refund

customer_id.description: Foreign key to the customers table, indicating the customer who received the refund

invoice_id.description: Foreign key to the invoices table, indicating the invoice associated with the refund

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who processed the refund

refund_status.description: The status of the refund (e.g., pending, approved, rejected)

refund_date.description: The date the refund was issued

created_date.description: Date and time when the refund record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the refund record was last updated

chargebacks.description: Stores information about chargebacks, including details about the disputed transaction, reason for the chargeback, and resolution status.

invoice_id.description: Foreign key to the invoices table

customer_id.description: Foreign key to the customers table

order_id.description: Foreign key to the orders table

payment_id.description: Foreign key to the payments table

case_id.description: Foreign key to the cases table

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the user who initiated or handled the chargeback

chargeback_date.description: Date when the chargeback was initiated

reason_code.description: Code representing the reason for the chargeback

reason_description.description: Detailed description of the reason for the chargeback

status.description: Current status of the chargeback (e.g., Open, Resolved, Rejected)

resolution_date.description: Date when the chargeback was resolved

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the chargeback

created_date.description: Date and time when the chargeback was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the chargeback was last updated

contact_addresses.description: Stores address information associated with contacts.

contact_address_id.description: Unique identifier for the contact address

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table

address_type.description: Type of address (e.g., Home, Work, Shipping)

is_primary.description: Indicates if this is the primary address for the contact

created_date.description: Date and time when the address was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the address was last updated

contact_tags.description: Associates contacts with specific tags, enabling categorization and filtering of contacts based on shared attributes.

contact_tag_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact-tag association.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

tag_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tags table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the contact-tag association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the contact-tag association was last updated.

contact_notes.description: Stores notes and comments associated with contacts in the CRM system.

contact_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact note entry.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the notes table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who created the note.

created_date.description: Date and time when the contact note was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the contact note was last updated.

contact_preferences.description: Stores communication preferences for contacts, such as preferred communication channel, opt-in status for different types of communications, and frequency preferences.

contact_preference_id.description: Unique identifier for the contact preference record

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table

preferred_channel.description: Preferred communication channel (e.g., email, phone, SMS)

email_opt_in.description: Flag indicating whether the contact has opted in to receive emails

sms_opt_in.description: Flag indicating whether the contact has opted in to receive SMS messages

phone_opt_in.description: Flag indicating whether the contact has opted in to receive phone calls

communication_frequency.description: Preferred communication frequency (e.g., daily, weekly, monthly)

notes.description: Any additional notes or comments regarding the contact's communication preferences

created_date.description: Date and time when the preference was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the preference was last updated

contact_relationships.description: Defines relationships between contacts, such as family members, business partners, or referrals.

contact_relationship_id.description: Unique identifier for the contact relationship

primary_contact_id.description: Foreign key to the primary contact in the relationship

related_contact_id.description: Foreign key to the related contact in the relationship

relationship_type.description: Type of relationship between the contacts (e.g., 'Family', 'Colleague', 'Referral')

relationship_description.description: A more detailed description of the relationship.

end_date.description: Date when the relationship ended (if applicable)

created_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was last updated

contact_emails.description: Junction table linking contacts and emails, representing the many-to-many relationship between them.

contact_email_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact-email relationship.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

email_id.description: Foreign key referencing the emails table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was last updated.

company_addresses.description: Stores address information for companies, allowing for multiple addresses per company.

company_address_id.description: Unique identifier for each company address entry.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the company to which this address belongs.

is_primary.description: Indicates if this is the primary address for the company.

created_date.description: Date and time when the address was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the address was last updated.

company_tags.description: Associates tags with companies, enabling categorization and filtering of companies based on various attributes.

company_tag_id.description: Unique identifier for each company tag association

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the companies table

tag_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tags table

created_date.description: Date and time when the tag was associated with the company

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated

company_notes.description: Associates notes with specific companies, providing a history of interactions, observations, and other relevant information.

company_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each company note entry.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the company associated with this note.

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the note itself.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user who created the note.

created_date.description: Date and time when the company note association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the company note association was last updated.

company_contacts.description: Junction table linking companies and contacts, representing the relationships between them and their roles.

company_contact_id.description: Unique identifier for each company-contact relationship

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table

role_id.description: Foreign key to the roles table, defining the contact's role within the company.

is_primary.description: Flag indicating if this contact is the primary contact for the company (1=yes, 0=no)

created_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was last updated

lead_sources.description: Stores information about the sources from which leads originate, such as website, referral, or advertisement.

lead_source_id.description: Unique identifier for each lead source.

source_description.description: Detailed description of the lead source.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the lead source is currently active.

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead source was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead source was last updated.

lead_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for a lead in the CRM system. This table defines the stages a lead can progress through.

lead_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each lead status

status_description.description: A more detailed description of the lead status

is_active.description: Flag indicating whether the lead status is currently active and available for use

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead status was last updated

lead_scores.description: Junction table linking leads and scores, representing the scores assigned to individual leads.

lead_score_id.description: Unique identifier for each lead score entry

lead_id.description: Foreign key referencing the lead table

score_id.description: Foreign key referencing the scores table

score_value.description: The actual score value assigned to the lead

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead score was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead score was last updated

lead_conversions.description: Junction table linking leads to conversions (contacts and opportunities), tracking the user responsible for the conversion.

lead_conversion_id.description: Unique identifier for each lead conversion record.

lead_id.description: Foreign key referencing the leads table.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table, representing the converted contact.

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key referencing the opportunities table, representing the created opportunity.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user responsible for the conversion.

conversion_date.description: Date and time when the lead was converted.

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead conversion record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead conversion record was last updated.

lead_assignments.description: Tracks the assignment of leads to specific users within the CRM system, recording who is responsible for managing each lead.

lead_assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for each lead assignment record.

lead_id.description: Foreign key referencing the leads table, indicating the lead being assigned.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user to whom the lead is assigned.

assigned_by.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user who made the assignment.

assignment_date.description: The date and time when the lead was assigned to the user.

notes.description: Any notes or comments related to the lead assignment.

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead assignment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead assignment record was last updated.

opportunity_sources.description: Stores information about the sources from which sales opportunities originate, linking opportunities to their origin.

opportunity_source_id.description: Unique identifier for each opportunity source.

source_name.description: Name of the opportunity source (e.g., 'Website', 'Referral', 'Trade Show').

source_description.description: A more detailed description of the opportunity source.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the opportunity source is currently active and available for selection.

created_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity source was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity source was last updated.

opportunity_stages.description: Defines the stages in the sales opportunity pipeline, representing the progression of a deal.

opportunity_stage_id.description: Unique identifier for each opportunity stage.

stage_order.description: Numerical order of the stage in the sales pipeline.

probability.description: Probability of closing the deal at this stage (as a percentage).

description.description: Detailed description of the activities and requirements for this stage.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the stage is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity stage was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity stage was last updated.

opportunity_statuses.description: Defines the possible status values for sales opportunities within the CRM system.

opportunity_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each opportunity status.

status_description.description: A more detailed description of the opportunity status.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the status is currently active and available for selection.

created_date.description: Date and time when the status was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the status was last updated.

opportunity_notes.description: Associates notes with specific opportunities, providing a record of communications, updates, and relevant information related to each sales opportunity.

opportunity_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each opportunity note entry

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key referencing the opportunity to which the note belongs

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the note itself in the notes table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user who created the note

created_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity note association was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity note association was last updated

deal_stages.description: Represents the different stages a deal can progress through in a sales pipeline. This table tracks the progression of deals through various stages, linking them to specific pipelines and defining the order and properties of each stage.

deal_stage_id.description: Unique identifier for the deal stage.

deal_pipeline_id.description: Foreign key referencing the deal_pipelines table, indicating which pipeline this stage belongs to.

pipeline_stage_id.description: Foreign key referencing the pipeline_stages table, indicating the generic stage definition.

stage_order.description: The order of this stage within the pipeline. Defines the sequence of stages.

stage_name.description: Name of the deal stage, e.g., 'Prospecting', 'Qualification', 'Closing'.

stage_probability.description: Probability of winning the deal at this stage, expressed as a percentage (e.g., 50 for 50%).

is_active.description: Flag indicating whether this deal stage is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal stage was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal stage was last updated.

deal_pipelines.description: Junction table linking deals and pipelines, representing the association of a deal with one or more pipelines.

deal_pipeline_id.description: Unique identifier for each deal-pipeline association

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table

pipeline_id.description: Foreign key to the pipelines table

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal-pipeline association was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal-pipeline association was last updated

deal_sources.description: Stores information about the sources from which deals originate, providing insights into the effectiveness of different lead generation channels.

deal_source_id.description: Unique identifier for each deal source.

source_name.description: Name of the deal source (e.g., 'Website', 'Referral', 'Trade Show').

source_description.description: A detailed description of the deal source.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the deal source is currently active.

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal source was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal source was last updated.

deal_notes.description: Represents notes associated with deals in the CRM system, linking deals to specific notes and users.

deal_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each deal note entry

deal_id.description: Foreign key referencing the deals table

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the notes table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who created the note

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal note was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal note was last updated

task_types.description: Defines the different types or categories of tasks that can be assigned within the CRM system.

task_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each task type.

description.description: A more detailed explanation of the task type.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the task type is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the task type was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the task type was last updated.

task_statuses.description: Stores the different statuses that a task can have, such as 'Open', 'In Progress', 'Completed', etc.

task_status_id.description: Unique identifier for the task status

status_name.description: Name of the task status (e.g., 'Open', 'In Progress', 'Completed')

status_description.description: A more detailed description of the task status

is_default.description: Indicates whether this is the default status for new tasks

created_date.description: Date and time when the task status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the task status was last updated

task_assignments.description: Represents the assignment of tasks to users, tracking who is responsible for specific tasks.

task_assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for each task assignment record.

task_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tasks table, identifying the specific task being assigned.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, identifying the user to whom the task is assigned.

assigned_by_user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, identifying the user who assigned the task.

assignment_date.description: The date when the task was assigned to the user.

due_date.description: The date by which the task is expected to be completed.

created_date.description: Date and time when the task assignment was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the task assignment was last updated.

task_comments.description: Junction table linking tasks and comments, enabling a many-to-many relationship between them. This table also stores the user who made the comment.

task_comment_id.description: Unique identifier for each task comment entry.

task_id.description: Foreign key referencing the task table.

comment_id.description: Foreign key referencing the comments table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who made the comment.

created_date.description: Date and time when the task comment was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the task comment was last updated.

meeting_attendees.description: Junction table linking meetings and attendees (contacts and users) to manage the many-to-many relationship.

meeting_attendee_id.description: Unique identifier for each meeting attendee record.

meeting_id.description: Foreign key referencing the meetings table.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table. Represents a contact attending the meeting.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table. Represents a user attending the meeting.

created_date.description: Date and time when the meeting attendee record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the meeting attendee record was last updated.

meeting_notes.description: Stores notes associated with meetings, providing a detailed record of discussions, decisions, and action items.

meeting_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each meeting note entry.

meeting_id.description: Foreign key referencing the meetings table, indicating the meeting to which this note belongs.

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the notes table, containing the actual note content.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user who created the note.

created_date.description: Date and time when the meeting note was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the meeting note was last updated.

meeting_types.description: Stores the different types or categories of meetings that can be scheduled within the CRM system.

meeting_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each meeting type.

name.description: Name of the meeting type (e.g., 'Sales Call', 'Project Update').

description.description: A more detailed description of the meeting type.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the meeting type is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the meeting type was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the meeting type was last updated.

call_logs.description: Stores information about phone call logs within the CRM system, tracking call details, participants, and outcomes.

call_log_id.description: Unique identifier for each call log entry

call_id.description: Identifier for the call (potentially linked to a telephony system)

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who made or received the call

caller_id.description: Caller ID of the calling party

callee_id.description: Caller ID of the called party

call_start_time.description: Timestamp indicating the start time of the call

call_end_time.description: Timestamp indicating the end time of the call

call_duration.description: Duration of the call in seconds

call_type.description: Type of call (e.g., inbound, outbound, internal)

call_outcome_id.description: Foreign key to the call_outcomes table, indicating the outcome of the call

call_recording_id.description: Foreign key to the call_recordings table, linking to the call recording if available

call_transcription_id.description: Foreign key to call_transcriptions table, linking to transcription if available

notes.description: Any notes or comments related to the call

created_date.description: Date and time when the call log was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the call log was last updated

call_recordings.description: Junction table linking calls and recordings, enabling a many-to-many relationship between them.

call_recording_id.description: Unique identifier for each call recording entry.

call_id.description: Foreign key referencing the 'calls' table, indicating the associated call.

recording_id.description: Foreign key referencing the 'recordings' table, indicating the associated recording.

created_date.description: Date and time when the call recording entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the call recording entry was last updated.

call_outcomes.description: Junction table linking calls and outcomes, representing the outcomes of specific calls.

call_outcome_id.description: Unique identifier for each call outcome entry.

call_id.description: Foreign key referencing the calls table.

outcome_id.description: Foreign key referencing the outcomes table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the call outcome was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the call outcome was last updated.

email_templates.description: Junction table linking emails and templates, enabling the association of multiple templates with multiple emails and tracking user associations.

email_template_id.description: Unique identifier for each email-template association.

email_id.description: Foreign key referencing the email table.

template_id.description: Foreign key referencing the templates table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user table; indicates the user associated with this email-template relation.

created_date.description: Date and time when the email-template association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the email-template association was last updated.

email_campaigns.description: Junction table linking emails and campaigns, storing information about which emails are associated with which campaigns.

email_campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for each email campaign association

campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the campaigns table

email_template_id.description: Foreign key referencing the email_templates table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who created the association

send_date.description: The date and time the email was scheduled or sent.

status.description: Status of the email campaign (e.g., scheduled, sent, failed)

created_date.description: Date and time when the email campaign association was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the email campaign association was last updated

email_attachments.description: Stores information about attachments associated with emails, linking emails to specific documents.

email_attachment_id.description: Unique identifier for each email attachment record.

email_id.description: Foreign key referencing the email_logs table, indicating the email to which this attachment belongs.

document_id.description: Foreign key referencing a documents table (assumed), indicating the attached document.

file_name.description: The original file name of the attachment.

file_size.description: The size of the attachment file in bytes.

file_type.description: The MIME type of the attachment file (e.g., application/pdf, image/jpeg).

file_path.description: The path to the stored attachment file on the server or cloud storage.

created_date.description: Date and time when the attachment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the attachment record was last updated.

email_logs.description: Stores logs of all sent emails, including sender, recipient, subject, body, status, and timestamps.

email_log_id.description: Unique identifier for each email log entry

email_id.description: Foreign key referencing the email_campaigns table or a unique identifier for individual emails if not part of a campaign

sender_user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user who sent the email

status.description: Status of the email (e.g., sent, delivered, opened, failed)

send_date.description: Date and time when the email was sent

open_date.description: Date and time when the email was opened by the recipient

click_date.description: Date and time when a link in the email was clicked by the recipient

email_template_id.description: Foreign key referencing the email_templates table, indicating the template used for the email

created_date.description: Date and time when the email log entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the email log entry was last updated

user_roles.description: Junction table linking users and roles, enabling many-to-many relationship between users and their assigned roles.

user_role_id.description: Unique identifier for each user-role assignment

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table

role_id.description: Foreign key referencing the roles table

created_date.description: Date and time when the user-role assignment was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the user-role assignment was last updated

user_permissions.description: Junction table linking users and permissions, enabling fine-grained access control.

user_permission_id.description: Unique identifier for each user-permission mapping

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table

user_role_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user_roles table, indicating the permission granted.

created_date.description: Date and time when the permission was granted

updated_date.description: Date and time when the permission was last updated

user_settings.description: Stores individual user-specific settings and preferences for the CRM system.

user_setting_id.description: Unique identifier for each user setting

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, identifying the user who owns this setting.

setting_value.description: Value of the setting, stored as a string.  Consider using JSON for complex settings.

created_date.description: Date and time when the setting was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the setting was last updated

pipeline_stages.description: Defines the stages within a sales or opportunity pipeline, outlining the progression of deals or opportunities.

pipeline_stage_id.description: Unique identifier for each pipeline stage

pipeline_id.description: Foreign key referencing the pipeline to which this stage belongs.

stage_order.description: Numerical order of the stage within the pipeline (e.g., 1, 2, 3)

stage_probability.description: Probability (as a percentage) of closing a deal or opportunity in this stage.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the stage is currently active in the pipeline.

created_date.description: Date and time when the pipeline stage was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the pipeline stage was last updated

campaign_types.description: Stores information about different types of marketing campaigns.

campaign_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each campaign type

campaign_type_name.description: Name of the campaign type (e.g., Email, Social Media, Webinar)

campaign_type_description.description: Detailed description of the campaign type

is_active.description: Flag indicating whether the campaign type is currently active

created_date.description: Date and time when the campaign type was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the campaign type was last updated

campaign_statuses.description: Stores the different status values for marketing campaigns, providing a controlled vocabulary for campaign lifecycle management.

campaign_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each campaign status

status_name.description: Name of the campaign status (e.g., 'Planned', 'In Progress', 'Completed', 'Cancelled')

status_description.description: Detailed description of the campaign status

is_active.description: Indicates whether the status is currently active and available for use

created_date.description: Date and time when the campaign status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the campaign status was last updated

campaign_performance.description: Stores performance metrics for marketing campaigns, tracking key indicators like impressions, clicks, conversions, and cost.

campaign_performance_id.description: Unique identifier for each campaign performance record.

campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the campaign to which this performance data belongs.

impressions.description: Number of times the campaign's ads were displayed.

clicks.description: Number of times the campaign's ads were clicked.

conversions.description: Number of conversions resulting from the campaign.

conversion_rate.description: The rate of conversion for the campaign

click_through_rate.description: The rate of click through for the campaign

average_position.description: The average position of the ad for the campaign

created_date.description: Date and time when the performance record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the performance record was last updated.

activity_types.description: Defines the different types or categories of activities that can be performed within the CRM system. Examples include 'Call', 'Email', 'Meeting', 'Task'.

activity_type_id.description: Unique identifier for the activity type.

activity_type_name.description: The name of the activity type (e.g., 'Call', 'Email').

activity_type_description.description: A more detailed description of the activity type.

is_enabled.description: Indicates whether the activity type is currently enabled for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the activity type was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the activity type was last updated.

product_categories.description: Junction table linking products and categories in a many-to-many relationship.

product_category_id.description: Unique identifier for each product-category relationship

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the product table

category_id.description: Foreign key referencing the categories table

created_date.description: Date and time when the product-category relationship was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the product-category relationship was last updated

product_prices.description: This junction table links products to their prices, allowing for multiple prices per product (e.g., different currencies, discounts, or price tiers).

product_price_id.description: Unique identifier for each product-price combination.

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the product table.

price_list_id.description: Foreign key referencing the price_list table.

currency.description: Currency code for the price (e.g., USD, EUR).

valid_from.description: Date from which this price is valid.

valid_to.description: Date until which this price is valid.

created_date.description: Date and time when the product price entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the product price entry was last updated.

product_inventory.description: Junction table linking products and inventory, representing the quantity of each product in a specific inventory location.

product_inventory_id.description: Unique identifier for each product-inventory combination

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the product table

inventory_id.description: Foreign key referencing the inventory table (assuming an inventory table exists)

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in the specified inventory location

created_date.description: Date and time when the product-inventory record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the product-inventory record was last updated

quote_items.description: This junction table links quotes and items (products), establishing a many-to-many relationship between them. It stores details about the quantity and price of each item included in a specific quote.

quote_item_id.description: Unique identifier for each quote item entry

quote_id.description: Foreign key referencing the quote table

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the products table

quantity.description: Quantity of the product included in the quote

price.description: The price of the item at the time of the quote. This allows price changes to not affect historical quotes.

discount.description: Discount applied to the item in the quote, stored as a percentage (e.g., 10 for 10%)

created_date.description: Date and time when the quote item was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the quote item was last updated

quote_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for quotes, such as 'Draft', 'Sent', 'Accepted', 'Rejected', etc.

quote_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each quote status

status_description.description: Detailed description of the quote status

is_active.description: Indicates whether the quote status is currently active and available for use

created_date.description: Date and time when the quote status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the quote status was last updated

invoice_items.description: Junction table linking invoices and products, representing individual items within an invoice.

invoice_item_id.description: Unique identifier for each invoice item.

invoice_id.description: Foreign key referencing the invoice table.

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the products table.

quantity.description: Quantity of the product included in the invoice item.

unit_price.description: Price of a single unit of the product at the time of invoicing.

discount.description: Discount applied to the invoice item, either as a percentage or fixed amount.

line_total.description: Total price for the invoice item after applying quantity, unit price, and discount.

description.description: Optional description of the invoice item.

created_date.description: Date and time when the invoice item was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the invoice item was last updated.

invoice_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for invoices within the CRM system.

invoice_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each invoice status

status_description.description: A more detailed description of the invoice status.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the status is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the invoice status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the invoice status was last updated

order_items.description: Junction table linking orders and products, storing details about individual items within an order.

order_item_id.description: Unique identifier for each order item

order_id.description: Foreign key referencing the orders table

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the products table

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in this order item

price.description: Price of the product at the time of the order (may differ from current product price)

discount.description: Discount applied to this order item

created_date.description: Date and time when the order item was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the order item was last updated

order_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for customer orders within the CRM system.

order_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each order status.

status_name.description: Descriptive name of the order status (e.g., 'Pending', 'Shipped', 'Delivered', 'Cancelled').

status_description.description: A more detailed description of the order status.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the status is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the order status was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the order status was last updated.

subscription_plans.description: Junction table linking subscriptions and plans, allowing for many-to-many relationships between them.

subscription_plan_id.description: Unique identifier for each subscription plan record.

subscription_id.description: Foreign key referencing the subscriptions table.

plan_id.description: Foreign key referencing the plans table.

start_date.description: The date the subscription plan became active.

end_date.description: The date the subscription plan expires or ends.

price.description: The price of the plan for this subscription.

created_date.description: Date and time when the subscription plan was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the subscription plan was last updated.

subscription_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for subscriptions within the CRM system.

subscription_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each subscription status.

status_name.description: Name of the subscription status (e.g., Active, Canceled, Trial).

status_description.description: Detailed description of the subscription status.

is_active.description: Flag indicating whether the status is currently considered active.

created_date.description: Date and time when the subscription status was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the subscription status was last updated.

subscription_payments.description: Junction table linking subscriptions and payments, representing individual payments made for a subscription.

subscription_payment_id.description: Unique identifier for each subscription payment record.

subscription_id.description: Foreign key referencing the subscriptions table.

invoice_id.description: Foreign key referencing the invoices table.

payment_amount.description: The amount paid for this specific payment.

payment_date.description: The date the payment was made.

created_date.description: Date and time when the subscription payment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the subscription payment record was last updated.

support_tickets.description: Junction table linking support tickets to contacts, users, ticket statuses, priorities, and products, enabling many-to-many relationships between these entities.

support_ticket_id.description: Unique identifier for each support ticket entry

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table, indicating the contact associated with the ticket

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user assigned to the ticket

ticket_status_id.description: Foreign key referencing the ticket_statuses table, indicating the current status of the ticket

ticket_priority_id.description: Foreign key referencing the ticket_priorities table, indicating the priority level of the ticket

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the products table, indicating the product associated with the ticket

created_date.description: Date and time when the support ticket entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the support ticket entry was last updated

ticket_statuses.description: Stores the possible status values for tickets in the CRM system.  This table defines the different stages a ticket can be in (e.g., Open, In Progress, Resolved, Closed).

ticket_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each ticket status.

status_name.description: Name of the ticket status (e.g., 'Open', 'In Progress').

status_description.description: A more detailed description of the status.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the status is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the ticket status was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the ticket status was last updated.

ticket_priorities.description: This junction table establishes a many-to-many relationship between tickets and priorities, allowing a ticket to have multiple priorities and a priority to be assigned to multiple tickets.

ticket_priority_id.description: Unique identifier for each ticket-priority relationship

ticket_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tickets table

priority_id.description: Foreign key referencing the priorities table

created_date.description: Date and time when this relationship was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when this relationship was last updated

ticket_assignments.description: Tracks the assignment of support tickets to users, indicating who is responsible for resolving a particular ticket.

ticket_assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for each ticket assignment record.

support_ticket_id.description: Foreign key referencing the support_tickets table. Indicates the ticket being assigned.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table. Indicates the user to whom the ticket is assigned.

assigned_date.description: Date and time when the ticket was assigned to the user.

created_date.description: Date and time when the ticket assignment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the ticket assignment record was last updated.

ticket_notes.description: Associates notes with support tickets, providing a history of communication and actions taken on each ticket.

ticket_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each ticket note entry

support_ticket_id.description: Foreign key referencing the support_tickets table

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the notes table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who created the note

created_date.description: Date and time when the ticket note was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the ticket note was last updated

case_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for cases within the CRM system, providing a controlled vocabulary for tracking case progress.

case_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each case status

status_name.description: Name of the case status (e.g., Open, In Progress, Resolved, Closed)

status_description.description: A more detailed description of what the case status represents.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the case status is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the case status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the case status was last updated

case_types.description: Defines the different types of cases that can be created within the CRM system. This allows for categorization and reporting on different types of issues or requests.

case_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each case type.

name.description: Name of the case type (e.g., 'Technical Support', 'Sales Inquiry').

description.description: A more detailed description of the case type.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the case type is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the case type was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the case type was last updated.

case_resolutions.description: Junction table linking cases and resolutions, allowing multiple resolutions per case.

case_resolution_id.description: Unique identifier for each case resolution record.

case_id.description: Foreign key referencing the cases table.

resolution_id.description: Foreign key referencing the resolutions table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the case resolution was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the case resolution was last updated.

case_assignments.description: Tracks the assignment of cases to specific users within the CRM system.

case_assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for each case assignment record.

case_id.description: Foreign key referencing the cases table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table.

assigned_date.description: Date and time when the case was assigned to the user.

created_date.description: Date and time when the case assignment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the case assignment record was last updated.

event_attendees.description: Junction table linking events and contacts, representing attendees at specific events.

event_attendee_id.description: Unique identifier for each event attendee record.

event_id.description: Foreign key referencing the event table.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who added the attendee.

attendance_status.description: Indicates the attendance status of the contact (e.g., 'Attended', 'Registered', 'No Show').

created_date.description: Date and time when the event attendee record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the event attendee record was last updated.

event_types.description: Defines the different types or categories of events that can occur within the CRM system, such as meetings, calls, or webinars.

event_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each event type.

event_type_name.description: The name of the event type (e.g., 'Meeting', 'Phone Call', 'Webinar').

description.description: A more detailed description of the event type.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the event type is currently active and available for use. 1 for active, 0 for inactive.

created_date.description: Date and time when the event type was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the event type was last updated.

event_notes.description: Stores notes or comments associated with specific events. This table links events to notes and users who created the notes.

event_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each event note entry.

event_id.description: Foreign key referencing the events table.  Indicates the event to which the note is associated.

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the notes table.  Indicates the note content.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table. Indicates the user who created the note.

created_date.description: Date and time when the event note was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the event note was last updated.

document_categories.description: Junction table linking documents and categories, enabling many-to-many relationship between them.

document_category_id.description: Unique identifier for each document-category association

document_id.description: Foreign key referencing the documents table

category_id.description: Foreign key referencing the categories table

created_date.description: Date and time when the association was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated

document_permissions.description: Junction table linking documents and permissions, managing user and role-based access control for documents.

document_permission_id.description: Unique identifier for each document permission record.

document_id.description: Foreign key referencing the document to which the permission applies.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user to whom the permission is granted. Can be NULL if permission is granted to a role.

user_role_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user role to which the permission is granted. Can be NULL if permission is granted to a specific user.

permission_type.description: Type of permission granted (e.g., read, write, delete).

created_date.description: Date and time when the permission was granted.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the permission was last updated.

document_versions.description: Junction table linking documents and their versions, allowing for multiple versions of a single document to be tracked.

document_version_id.description: Unique identifier for each document version entry.

document_id.description: Foreign key referencing the document table.

version_id.description: Foreign key referencing the versions table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the document version entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the document version entry was last updated.

notification_preferences.description: Stores user preferences for different types of notifications within the CRM system.

notification_preference_id.description: Unique identifier for each notification preference setting.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user to whom these preferences belong.

notification_type.description: Type of notification (e.g., email, SMS, push).

is_enabled.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the notification type is enabled for the user.

frequency.description: Frequency of the notification (e.g., daily, weekly, immediately).

created_date.description: Date and time when the notification preference was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the notification preference was last updated.

audit_logs.description: Stores audit logs for tracking changes and activities within the CRM system, providing a history of actions performed by users and system processes.

audit_log_id.description: Unique identifier for each audit log entry

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user who performed the action

table_name.description: Name of the table that was affected by the logged action

record_id.description: ID of the specific record in the affected table

old_values.description: JSON object storing the old values of the record before the action

new_values.description: JSON object storing the new values of the record after the action

ip_address.description: IP address of the user or system that performed the action

user_agent.description: User agent string of the user or system that performed the action

description.description: Detailed description of the audit log entry

created_date.description: Date and time when the audit log entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the audit log entry was last updated

system_settings.description: Stores system-wide configuration settings for the CRM application, including default values, feature flags, and other global parameters.

setting_id.description: Unique identifier for each system setting

setting_value.description: Value of the system setting; can be a string, number, or boolean represented as a string

setting_description.description: A detailed description of the setting's purpose and usage

data_type.description: The data type of the setting value (e.g., 'string', 'integer', 'boolean')

is_active.description: Indicates whether the setting is currently active

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who last modified the setting (optional)

created_date.description: Date and time when the setting was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the setting was last updated

integration_logs.description: Stores logs for various integrations within the CRM system, providing a history of integration activities.

integration_log_id.description: Unique identifier for each integration log entry

integration_id.description: Foreign key referencing the integrations table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user associated with the integration activity

log_level.description: Severity level of the log entry (e.g., INFO, WARNING, ERROR)

message.description: Detailed message describing the integration activity

context.description: JSON blob containing additional context or data related to the log entry

created_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was last updated

webhook_events.description: Junction table linking webhooks and events, enabling tracking of which webhooks were triggered by specific events.
