webhook_event_id.description: Unique identifier for each webhook event record.

webhook_id.description: Foreign key referencing the webhooks table.

event_id.description: Foreign key referencing the events table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the webhook event was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the webhook event was last updated.

api_keys.description: Junction table linking APIs and Keys, establishing a many-to-many relationship between them.  Also stores user association and usage information.

api_key_id.description: Unique identifier for each API key entry.

api_id.description: Foreign key referencing the API table.

key_id.description: Foreign key referencing the Keys table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table.

usage_count.description: Number of times this API key has been used.

last_used_date.description: Date and time when the API key was last used.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the API key is currently active.

created_date.description: Date and time when the API key was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the API key was last updated.

email_blacklist.description: Junction table representing a many-to-many relationship between emails and the blacklist. Indicates that a specific email address has been blacklisted.

email_address.description: Email address that is blacklisted. Part of the primary key and a foreign key referencing the 'email' table.

blacklist_reason.description: Reason for blacklisting the email address.

blacklisted_date.description: Date and time when the email address was added to the blacklist.

created_date.description: Date and time when the entry was created in the email_blacklist table.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the entry was last updated in the email_blacklist table.

sms_templates.description: Junction table linking SMS messages and templates, allowing multiple templates to be associated with an SMS message and vice versa.

sms_template_id.description: Unique identifier for each SMS-Template association.

sms_id.description: Foreign key referencing the sms table.

template_id.description: Foreign key referencing the templates table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user who created this association.

created_date.description: Date and time when the association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated.

phone_calls.description: Junction table linking phone numbers and calls, also associating calls with contacts, leads, users, and accounts.

phone_call_id.description: Unique identifier for each phone call record

call_id.description: Foreign key to the calls table

phone_number.description: Phone number involved in the call

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the contact involved in the call.

lead_id.description: Foreign key to the leads table, representing the lead involved in the call.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the user who made or received the call.

account_id.description: Foreign key to the accounts table, representing the account involved in the call.

created_date.description: Date and time when the phone call record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the phone call record was last updated

call_transcriptions.description: Junction table linking calls and transcriptions, enabling many-to-many relationships between them. Also includes contact and user information related to the transcription.

transcription_id.description: Unique identifier for each transcription record. Part of the composite primary key.

call_id.description: Foreign key referencing the calls table. Part of the composite primary key.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table, indicating the contact associated with the call transcription.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user who created or processed the call transcription.

transcription_text.description: The actual transcribed text of the call.

confidence_score.description: A score indicating the confidence level of the transcription accuracy (e.g., from an AI transcription service).

created_date.description: Date and time when the transcription record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the transcription record was last updated.

chat_conversations.description: Junction table linking chats to conversations, contacts, users, leads, and opportunities, establishing the context of a chat within the CRM.

chat_conversation_id.description: Unique identifier for each chat_conversation entry

chat_id.description: Foreign key referencing the chat table

conversation_id.description: Foreign key referencing the conversations table

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table

lead_id.description: Foreign key referencing the leads table

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key referencing the opportunities table

created_date.description: Date and time when the chat_conversation entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the chat_conversation entry was last updated

chat_messages.description: Junction table linking chat conversations and individual messages, storing metadata about message participation in a chat context.

conversation_id.description: Foreign key referencing the chat_conversations table

sender_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user who sent the message (can be internal user or contact)

recipient_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user who received the message (can be internal user or contact)

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contact involved in the message, if applicable

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the internal user involved in the message, if applicable

message_content.description: The actual text content of the message.

message_type.description: Type of message (e.g., text, attachment, system message).

sent_date.description: Date and time when the message was sent

read_status.description: Indicates whether the message has been read by the recipient (0 = unread, 1 = read)

created_date.description: Date and time when the chat_message entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the chat_message entry was last updated

chat_attachments.description: Stores file attachments associated with chat messages within the CRM system.

message_id.description: Foreign key referencing the chat_messages table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who uploaded the attachment

file_path.description: Path to the stored file on the server or cloud storage

file_size.description: Size of the file in bytes

file_type.description: MIME type of the file (e.g., image/jpeg, application/pdf)

created_date.description: Date and time when the attachment was uploaded

updated_date.description: Date and time when the attachment record was last updated

survey_responses.description: Junction table linking surveys to individual responses, contacts, and users, recording the association between a survey, the specific response given, the contact who provided the response, and the user who managed the survey process.

response_id.description: Unique identifier for each survey response record

survey_id.description: Foreign key to the surveys table, indicating the survey being responded to.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, identifying the contact who provided the response.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, identifying the user who managed the survey process or recorded the response.

response_data.description: Stores the actual response data, likely as a JSON string or serialized format, depending on the survey structure.

submission_date.description: Date and time when the survey response was submitted.

created_date.description: Date and time when the survey response record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the survey response record was last updated.

customer_feedback.description: Stores customer feedback data collected from various sources, including surveys, tickets, and direct feedback forms.

feedback_id.description: Unique identifier for each feedback entry

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table, identifying the customer who provided the feedback

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the companies table, identifying the company associated with the feedback

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the products table, identifying the product the feedback is about

ticket_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tickets table, if the feedback originated from a support ticket

survey_id.description: Foreign key referencing the surveys table, if the feedback was collected through a survey

feedback_type.description: Type of feedback (e.g., positive, negative, neutral, suggestion, bug report)

feedback_text.description: The actual feedback text provided by the customer

feedback_rating.description: A numerical rating of the feedback (e.g., 1-5 stars)

feedback_date.description: Date when the feedback was submitted

resolution_status.description: Status of the feedback resolution (e.g., open, in progress, resolved, closed)

created_date.description: Date and time when the feedback entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the feedback entry was last updated

customer_reviews.description: Junction table linking customers to their reviews, products, and orders. This table facilitates tracking which customer left which review for a specific product purchased in a particular order.

customer_id.description: Foreign key referencing the customer table

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the product table

order_id.description: Foreign key referencing the orders table

review_text.description: The actual text content of the customer review

rating.description: Numerical rating given by the customer (e.g., 1-5 stars)

review_date.description: Date when the review was submitted

created_date.description: Date and time when the record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

seo_data.description: Junction table linking SEO data to various entities (contacts, companies, leads, opportunities, deals, campaigns) via their IDs and page URL.

seo_data_id.description: Unique identifier for each SEO data entry

page_url.description: URL of the page being tracked for SEO data

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

lead_id.description: Foreign key to the leads table

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunities table

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table

campaign_id.description: Foreign key to the campaigns table

keyword.description: Keyword associated with the SEO data

rank.description: Ranking of the page for the keyword

created_date.description: Date and time when the SEO data was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the SEO data was last updated

marketing_analytics.description: Junction table linking marketing campaigns, analytics data, and related entities like leads, opportunities, deals, and users. This table facilitates the tracking and analysis of marketing campaign performance across different stages of the sales funnel.

analytic_id.description: Unique identifier for the analytics entry. Primary Key.

campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the marketing campaigns table.

lead_id.description: Foreign key referencing the leads table.

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key referencing the opportunities table.

deal_id.description: Foreign key referencing the deals table.

email_campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the email campaigns table.

ad_campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the ad campaigns table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table. Represents the user associated with the analytics data.

clicks.description: Number of clicks associated with the marketing activity.

impressions.description: Number of impressions associated with the marketing activity.

conversions.description: Number of conversions resulting from the marketing activity.

cost.description: Cost associated with the marketing activity.

revenue.description: Revenue generated from the marketing activity.

created_date.description: Date and time when the analytics entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the analytics entry was last updated.

customer_journey.description: This junction table links customers to their journeys, tracking their interactions and progress across various stages.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the customer

lead_id.description: Foreign key to the leads table, representing the lead associated with the journey

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunities table, representing the opportunity associated with the journey

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table, representing the deal associated with the journey

campaign_id.description: Foreign key to the campaigns table, representing the campaign associated with the journey

activity_id.description: Foreign key to the activities table, representing the activity associated with the journey

journey_stage.description: The current stage of the customer's journey (e.g., Awareness, Consideration, Decision)

journey_start_date.description: The date and time when the customer's journey began

journey_end_date.description: The date and time when the customer's journey ended (if applicable)

journey_status.description: The current status of the customer's journey (e.g., Active, Completed, Abandoned)

created_date.description: Date and time when the record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

sales_forecasting.description: Junction table linking sales data with forecasting information, providing a granular view of predicted sales performance.

forecast_id.description: Unique identifier for each sales forecast entry.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user table, indicating the user responsible for the forecast.

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key referencing the opportunities table, representing the sales opportunity being forecasted.

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the products table, indicating the product being forecasted.

pipeline_stage_id.description: Foreign key referencing the pipeline_stages table, representing the current stage of the sales pipeline.

deal_id.description: Foreign key referencing the deals table, representing the sales deal being forecasted.

forecast_amount.description: The forecasted sales amount for the specified opportunity, product, and pipeline stage.

forecast_date.description: The date for which the sales forecast is predicted.

confidence_level.description: The confidence level (as a percentage) associated with the sales forecast.

notes.description: Additional notes or comments related to the sales forecast.

created_date.description: Date and time when the sales forecast entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the sales forecast entry was last updated.

competitor_analysis.description: This junction table links competitors to specific analyses, opportunities, and deals, allowing for tracking of competitive intelligence related to sales efforts.

analysis_id.description: Unique identifier for the analysis record. Primary Key and Foreign Key referencing the analysis table.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the competitor's company ID.

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key referencing the opportunity ID associated with the analysis.

deal_id.description: Foreign key referencing the deal ID associated with the analysis.

analysis_details.description: Detailed notes and findings from the competitor analysis.

created_date.description: Date and time when the analysis record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the analysis record was last updated.

loyalty_programs.description: Junction table linking loyalty programs and contacts, indicating which contacts are enrolled in which programs.

program_id.description: Foreign key referencing the programs table.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the companies table.

enrollment_date.description: Date when the contact enrolled in the loyalty program.

status.description: Status of the contact's enrollment in the program (e.g., active, inactive).

points_earned.description: Total points earned by the contact in this loyalty program.

created_date.description: Date and time when the record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the record was last updated.

referral_programs.description: Junction table linking referrals and programs, capturing details of referral program participation.

referral_program_id.description: Unique identifier for each referral program entry

referrer_contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the referrer

referee_contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the referee

campaign_id.description: Foreign key to the campaigns table, representing the campaign

discount_id.description: Foreign key to the discounts table, representing the discount applied

referral_date.description: Date when the referral was made

status.description: Status of the referral (e.g., pending, approved, rejected)

program_details.description: Additional details or notes about the referral program participation

created_date.description: Date and time when the referral program entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the referral program entry was last updated

billing_cycles.description: Junction table linking billing events and cycles, representing the billing cycles associated with specific subscriptions and customers.

billing_cycle_id.description: Unique identifier for each billing cycle record

subscription_id.description: Foreign key referencing the subscriptions table

customer_id.description: Foreign key referencing the customers table

billing_date.description: The date on which the billing cycle occurred.

amount.description: The amount billed during this billing cycle.

status.description: Status of the billing cycle (e.g., 'pending', 'paid', 'failed')

created_date.description: Date and time when the billing cycle record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the billing cycle record was last updated

customer_segments.description: Junction table linking customers to segments, enabling many-to-many relationships between customers and segments.

customer_id.description: Foreign key referencing the customer table.

segment_id.description: Foreign key referencing the segments table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the customer was added to the segment.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the customer's segment association was last updated.

ad_campaigns.description: Stores information about individual ad campaigns associated with a broader marketing campaign.

ad_campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for each ad campaign

campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the main campaign

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user responsible for the ad campaign

ad_platform.description: The platform on which the ad campaign is running (e.g., Google Ads, Facebook Ads)

ad_name.description: Name of the ad within the campaign

ad_content.description: The actual content of the ad (text, image, video URL, etc.)

budget.description: The budget allocated to this specific ad campaign

start_date.description: The start date of the ad campaign

end_date.description: The end date of the ad campaign

status.description: The current status of the ad campaign (e.g., active, paused, completed)

created_date.description: Date and time when the ad campaign was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the ad campaign was last updated

ad_performance.description: Stores performance metrics for individual ads within a marketing campaign.

ad_performance_id.description: Unique identifier for each ad performance record.

ad_campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the ad_campaign table, identifying the campaign to which the ad belongs.

impressions.description: Number of times the ad was displayed.

clicks.description: Number of times the ad was clicked.

cost.description: Cost associated with the ad's performance.

conversions.description: Number of conversions resulting from the ad.

created_date.description: Date and time when the ad performance record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the ad performance record was last updated.

sms_logs.description: Stores logs of SMS messages sent through the CRM system, including details about the sender, recipient, content, status, and timestamps.

sms_log_id.description: Unique identifier for each SMS log entry

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the recipient of the SMS

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the user who initiated the SMS

campaign_id.description: Foreign key to the campaigns table, representing the campaign associated with the SMS

phone_number.description: The phone number to which the SMS was sent

message_content.description: The content of the SMS message

status.description: The status of the SMS message (e.g., sent, delivered, failed)

error_code.description: Error code if the SMS failed to send

error_message.description: Error message if the SMS failed to send

sent_date.description: Date and time when the SMS was sent

created_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was last updated

push_notifications.description: Junction table linking notifications to users, contacts, leads, and campaigns, indicating who received which push notification.

push_notification_id.description: Unique identifier for each push notification record

notification_id.description: Foreign key referencing the notifications table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table

lead_id.description: Foreign key referencing the leads table

campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the campaigns table

status.description: Status of the push notification (e.g., sent, delivered, opened)

created_date.description: Date and time when the push notification record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the push notification record was last updated

data_exports.description: Junction table linking data records to exports, indicating which data records were included in which exports. Also tracks the user who initiated the export.

export_id.description: Foreign key referencing the exports table

data_id.description: Foreign key referencing the data table, representing a data record included in the export

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who initiated the export

export_date.description: Date and time when the data was exported

created_date.description: Date and time when the entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the entry was last updated

data_imports.description: Junction table linking data records to import batches, facilitating tracking of data origin and import history.

data_import_id.description: Unique identifier for each data import record.

data_id.description: Foreign key referencing the data table.

import_id.description: Foreign key referencing the imports table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who initiated the import.

import_status.description: Status of the import for this specific data record (e.g., 'success', 'failed', 'pending').

import_message.description: Optional message providing details about the import status (e.g., error messages).

created_date.description: Date and time when the data import record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the data import record was last updated.

data_migrations.description: Junction table linking data records to migrations, tracking which data records were affected by which migrations.

data_migration_id.description: Unique identifier for each data migration record.

data_id.description: Foreign key referencing the data table, identifying the specific data record.

migration_id.description: Foreign key referencing the migrations table, identifying the specific migration.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, identifying the user who performed the migration.

migration_status.description: Status of the migration for this specific data record (e.g., 'pending', 'success', 'failed').

migration_message.description: Optional message providing details about the migration status (e.g., error messages).

created_date.description: Date and time when this data migration record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when this data migration record was last updated.

system_errors.description: This is a junction table linking systems and errors, recording which errors occurred on which systems. It also records the user associated with the error.

error_id.description: Unique identifier for each error event.

system_id.description: Foreign key referencing the system that generated the error.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user associated with the error.  Could be the user who triggered the error or the user who reported it.

error_message.description: Detailed description of the error that occurred.

error_code.description: Specific error code associated with the error.

error_timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the error occurred.

created_date.description: Date and time when the error record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the error record was last updated.

crm_versions.description: Junction table linking CRMs and Versions, representing the versions associated with a specific CRM record.

crm_version_id.description: Unique identifier for each CRM-Version association.

crm_id.description: Foreign key referencing the CRM record.

version_id.description: Foreign key referencing the Version record.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user who created the version association.

created_date.description: Date and time when the CRM-Version association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the CRM-Version association was last updated.

legal_agreements.description: Junction table linking legal documents and agreements, associating them with contacts, companies, and users.

legal_agreement_id.description: Unique identifier for each legal agreement record.

agreement_id.description: Foreign key referencing the agreements table.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the companies table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table.

legal_document_url.description: URL or path to the legal document associated with the agreement.

agreement_date.description: Date when the agreement was signed or accepted.

status.description: Status of the legal agreement (e.g., active, inactive, pending).

created_date.description: Date and time when the legal agreement record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the legal agreement record was last updated.

privacy_settings.description: Stores privacy settings for users, defining what data is visible to whom and how it's used.

setting_id.description: Unique identifier for each privacy setting

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, identifying the user to whom this privacy setting applies.

data_sharing_consent.description: Flag indicating whether the user has consented to data sharing (e.g., with third-party services).

profile_visibility.description: Defines who can view the user's profile (e.g., 'public', 'contacts', 'private').

activity_tracking_enabled.description: Flag indicating whether activity tracking is enabled for the user.

location_sharing_enabled.description: Flag indicating whether location sharing is enabled for the user.

ad_personalization_enabled.description: Flag indicating whether ad personalization is enabled for the user.

created_date.description: Date and time when the privacy settings were created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the privacy settings were last updated

user_feedback.description: Stores feedback provided by users of the CRM system, including ratings, comments, and associated details.

feedback_id.description: Unique identifier for each feedback entry

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user who provided the feedback

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contact associated with the feedback (if applicable)

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the company associated with the feedback (if applicable)

rating.description: Numerical rating provided by the user (e.g., 1-5 stars)

comment.description: Free-text comment provided by the user

feedback_type.description: Type of feedback (e.g., feature request, bug report, general comment)

resolution_status.description: Indicates whether the feedback has been resolved (e.g., open, in progress, resolved)

created_date.description: Date and time when the feedback was submitted

updated_date.description: Date and time when the feedback was last updated

feature_requests.description: Junction table linking feature requests to users who requested them, enabling tracking of user interest in specific features.

request_id.description: Unique identifier for each feature request record.

feature_id.description: Foreign key referencing the feature table, indicating the requested feature.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user who requested the feature.

request_date.description: Date when the feature request was made.

created_date.description: Date and time when the request was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the request was last updated.

product_roadmaps.description: Junction table linking products and roadmaps, enabling many-to-many relationships between them. Also tracks the user responsible for the association.

roadmap_id.description: Foreign key referencing the roadmaps table.

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the products table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who associated the product with the roadmap.

created_date.description: Date and time when the association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated.

beta_testers.description: Junction table linking beta programs and testers, establishing a many-to-many relationship between them.  Associates users with specific beta programs they are participating in.

beta_tester_id.description: Unique identifier for each beta tester assignment

beta_id.description: Foreign key to the beta programs table

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the tester

join_date.description: Date when the user joined the beta program

feedback_submitted.description: Flag indicating if the tester has submitted feedback for the beta program

created_date.description: Date and time when the beta tester assignment was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the beta tester assignment was last updated

release_notes.description: Stores release notes for the CRM system, providing details about updates, bug fixes, and new features.

release_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each release note

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating who created the release note.

content.description: Detailed content of the release note (e.g., description of changes).

release_date.description: Date when the release was deployed.

created_date.description: Date and time when the release note was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the release note was last updated

compliance_reports.description: Junction table linking compliance requirements and reports (incident, custom, etc.). This table establishes a many-to-many relationship between compliance items and various types of reports, associating reports with specific compliance standards.

compliance_report_id.description: Unique identifier for each compliance report entry.

report_id.description: Foreign key referencing the reports table (e.g., incident_reports, custom_reports).

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user associated with the report.

document_id.description: Foreign key referencing the documents table, if the report is related to a specific document.

case_id.description: Foreign key referencing the cases table, if the report is related to a specific case.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table, if the report is related to a specific contact.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the companies table, if the report is related to a specific company.

compliance_id.description: Foreign key referencing the compliance table, linking the report to a specific compliance requirement.

created_date.description: Date and time when the compliance report entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the compliance report entry was last updated.

audit_compliance.description: Junction table linking audits to compliance requirements, indicating which compliance requirements were checked during an audit.

audit_id.description: Foreign key referencing the audit table.

compliance_id.description: Foreign key referencing the compliance table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who performed the audit.

object_id.description: ID of the object being audited (e.g., contact_id, company_id).

comments.description: Any comments or notes related to the compliance check.

created_date.description: Date and time when the audit compliance record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the audit compliance record was last updated.

security_policies.description: Junction table linking user roles to security policies, defining which roles have access to which policies.

security_policy_id.description: Unique identifier for the security policy assignment.

policy_id.description: Foreign key referencing the policies table. Identifies the security policy.

user_role_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user_roles table. Identifies the user role.

created_date.description: Date and time when the security policy assignment was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the security policy assignment was last updated.

incident_reports.description: Junction table linking incidents to related entities like users, contacts, companies, tickets, and cases.

incident_id.description: Foreign key referencing the incident table.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the companies table.

ticket_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tickets table.

case_id.description: Foreign key referencing the cases table.

report_type.description: Type of report associated with the incident (e.g., custom, compliance).

report_details.description: Additional details or notes about the report.

created_date.description: Date and time when the incident report was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the incident report was last updated.

access_controls.description: Junction table linking users, roles, and specific objects to define access permissions. This table determines who can access what within the CRM system.

access_control_id.description: Unique identifier for each access control entry.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user associated with this access control entry.

role_id.description: Foreign key referencing the roles table, indicating the role associated with this access control entry.

object_type.description: Specifies the type of object (e.g., 'contact', 'company', 'opportunity') to which this access control applies.

object_id.description: Foreign key referencing the specific object (e.g., contact_id, company_id) to which this access control applies. The actual table referenced depends on the object_type.

permission_type.description: Specifies the type of permission granted (e.g., 'read', 'write', 'delete').

created_date.description: Date and time when the access control entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the access control entry was last updated.

device_tracking.description: Junction table linking devices and tracking events, enabling the tracking of device usage and status over time for users.

device_tracking_id.description: Unique identifier for each device tracking record.

device_id.description: Foreign key referencing the device being tracked.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user associated with the device tracking.

tracking_event.description: Description of the tracking event (e.g., login, logout, usage).

tracking_data.description: JSON data containing specific details about the tracking event.

tracking_timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the tracking event occurred.

created_date.description: Date and time when the device tracking record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the device tracking record was last updated.

data_encryption.description: Junction table linking data entries to their encryption details, enabling many-to-many relationships between data and encryption methods.

data_id.description: Foreign key referencing the data table.

encryption_id.description: Foreign key referencing the encryption table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated.

backup_recovery.description: Junction table linking backups and recoveries, enabling many-to-many relationships between them. This table tracks which backup was used for which recovery operation.

backup_id.description: Foreign key referencing the backup table, identifying the specific backup used in the recovery.

recovery_id.description: Foreign key referencing the recovery table, identifying the specific recovery operation performed.

recovery_date.description: Date and time when the recovery was performed using the specified backup.

created_date.description: Date and time when the relationship between backup and recovery was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the relationship between backup and recovery was last updated.

custom_fields.description: Junction table linking custom entities to fields, allowing for dynamic and customizable data storage within the CRM.

custom_field_id.description: Unique identifier for each custom field entry.

custom_id.description: Foreign key referencing the custom entity to which this field belongs.

field_id.description: Foreign key referencing the field definition.

field_value.description: The actual value stored in the custom field.  Data type will depend on the field definition.

field_type.description: Specifies the type of the custom field (e.g., text, number, date). Foreign key to a field_types table.

related_table.description: Specifies which table this custom field relates to (e.g., contacts, companies).

created_date.description: Date and time when the custom field entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the custom field entry was last updated.

custom_reports.description: Junction table linking users to custom reports, allowing users to save and access specific report configurations.

report_id.description: Unique identifier for the custom report

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table

report_description.description: Detailed description of the report's purpose and content

report_configuration.description: JSON blob storing the report's specific configuration settings (e.g., filters, columns, sorting)

created_date.description: Date and time when the report was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the report was last updated

custom_dashboards.description: Junction table linking custom user settings to specific dashboards, enabling personalized dashboard configurations for each user.

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user.

custom_settings.description: JSON blob storing custom settings for the dashboard for a specific user. This allows for personalized configurations.

created_date.description: Date and time when the association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated.

workflow_automations.description: Junction table linking workflows and automations, representing a many-to-many relationship between them. It stores which automations are associated with which workflows.

workflow_automation_id.description: Unique identifier for each workflow-automation association.

workflow_id.description: Foreign key referencing the workflows table.

automation_id.description: Foreign key referencing the automations table.

execution_order.description: The order in which the automation should be executed within the workflow.

created_by_user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who created this entry.

last_modified_by_user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating who last modified this entry.

created_date.description: Date and time when the workflow-automation association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the workflow-automation association was last updated.

approval_processes.description: Junction table linking approvals to specific records and processes, indicating which approval process applies to which record.

approval_process_id.description: Unique identifier for each approval process instance.

record_id.description: The ID of the record that requires approval (e.g., opportunity_id, quote_id).

record_type.description: The type of record that requires approval (e.g., 'opportunity', 'quote').  Used to determine which table the record_id refers to.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who initiated the approval process.

approval_status.description: The current status of the approval process for this record (e.g., 'pending', 'approved', 'rejected').

approval_date.description: Date and time when the approval was granted or rejected.  Null if still pending.

comments.description: Any comments or notes related to the approval process.

created_date.description: Date and time when the approval process was initiated.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the approval process was last updated.

sla_agreements.description: This junction table links Service Level Agreements (SLAs) to various entities within the CRM, such as accounts, contacts, cases, opportunities, and users. It establishes a many-to-many relationship between SLAs and these entities.

sla_agreement_id.description: Unique identifier for each SLA agreement record

sla_id.description: Foreign key referencing the SLA table

account_id.description: Foreign key referencing the accounts table

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table

case_id.description: Foreign key referencing the cases table

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key referencing the opportunities table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table

agreement_id.description: Foreign key referencing the legal_agreements table

start_date.description: The date the SLA agreement becomes active.

end_date.description: The date the SLA agreement expires.

status.description: The current status of the SLA agreement (e.g., Active, Inactive, Expired).

created_date.description: Date and time when the SLA agreement was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the SLA agreement was last updated

knowledge_base.description: Junction table linking knowledge articles to categories, authors, and products, establishing a many-to-many relationship between them.

article_id.description: Foreign key referencing the knowledge_articles table.

category_id.description: Foreign key referencing the knowledge_categories table.

author_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, representing the author of the article.

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the products table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated.

internal_wiki.description: Junction table linking internal resources (e.g., internal messages, documents) to wiki pages, categories, and authors. This table facilitates the organization and retrieval of internal knowledge and documentation.

wiki_id.description: Foreign key referencing the wiki table, part of the composite primary key.

author_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, representing the author of the wiki entry, part of the composite primary key.

category_id.description: Foreign key referencing the wiki_categories table, categorizing the wiki entry, part of the composite primary key.

internal_resource_id.description: Foreign key referencing the internal_messages table, linking to a specific internal resource (e.g., message, document).

created_date.description: Date and time when the entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the entry was last updated.

content_management.description: Junction table linking content items to management aspects, such as authors and categories. This facilitates many-to-many relationships between content and its management metadata.

content_id.description: Foreign key referencing the content table.

author_id.description: Foreign key referencing the authors table.

category_id.description: Foreign key referencing the categories table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the content management entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the content management entry was last updated

team_collaboration.description: This junction table represents the many-to-many relationship between teams and various collaboration activities (tasks, meetings, documents, opportunities, deals, projects).

collaboration_id.description: Unique identifier for the collaboration event. Primary key.

team_id.description: Foreign key referencing the team involved in the collaboration.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user involved in the collaboration.

task_id.description: Foreign key referencing a task associated with the collaboration.

meeting_id.description: Foreign key referencing a meeting associated with the collaboration.

document_id.description: Foreign key referencing a document associated with the collaboration.

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key referencing an opportunity associated with the collaboration.

deal_id.description: Foreign key referencing a deal associated with the collaboration.

project_id.description: Foreign key referencing a project associated with the collaboration.

created_date.description: Date and time when the collaboration record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the collaboration record was last updated.

internal_messages.description: Junction table linking internal users and messages, enabling many-to-many relationships between users and messages.

sender_id.description: Foreign key referencing the internal_wiki table for the message sender.

recipient_id.description: Foreign key referencing the internal_wiki table for the message recipient.

message_content.description: The actual content of the message.

sent_date.description: Date and time when the message was sent

is_read.description: Flag indicating whether the message has been read by the recipient.

created_date.description: Date and time when the message record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the message record was last updated.

goal_tracking.description: This junction table links goals to tracking data, associating specific goals with user, team, and objective performance metrics.

goal_tracking_id.description: Unique identifier for each goal tracking entry

goal_id.description: Foreign key referencing the goal table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user table

team_id.description: Foreign key referencing the team table

objective_id.description: Foreign key referencing the objective table

tracking_data.description: Stores the tracking data associated with the goal (e.g., progress, metrics).

tracking_date.description: The date on which the tracking data was recorded.

notes.description: Additional notes or comments related to the tracking entry.

created_date.description: Date and time when the goal tracking record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the goal tracking record was last updated

okr_management.description: Junction table linking OKRs to management (users, departments, and companies) to define ownership and responsibility.

okr_id.description: Foreign key referencing the OKR table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user responsible for the OKR

department_id.description: Foreign key referencing the departments table, indicating the department associated with the OKR

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the companies table, indicating the company associated with the OKR

created_date.description: Date and time when the record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

sales_incentives.description: Junction table linking sales activities with applicable incentives. This table establishes a many-to-many relationship between sales (deals, users, products, campaigns) and incentives, allowing for flexible incentive application.

incentive_id.description: Unique identifier for the incentive record.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user table, indicating the sales representative involved.

deal_id.description: Foreign key referencing the deals table, linking to the specific sales deal.

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the products table, specifying the product associated with the incentive.

campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the campaigns table, linking to the marketing campaign associated with the incentive.

incentive_type.description: Type of incentive applied (e.g., percentage discount, fixed amount, bonus points).

incentive_value.description: Value of the incentive (e.g., 10 for 10% discount, 50 for $50 bonus).

start_date.description: Date when the incentive becomes valid.

created_date.description: Date and time when the incentive record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the incentive record was last updated.

training_modules.description: Junction table linking training courses and modules, and tracking user enrollment and completion status.

training_module_id.description: Unique identifier for each training module entry

module_id.description: Foreign key referencing the modules table

course_id.description: Foreign key referencing the training_courses table

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table

completion_date.description: Date when the module was completed by the user

status.description: Status of the module (e.g., 'Not Started', 'In Progress', 'Completed')

created_date.description: Date and time when the training module entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the training module entry was last updated

elearning_courses.description: Junction table linking elearning modules to courses, users, and product categories, tracking which users are taking which courses and which products and categories they belong to.

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the products table, indicating which product the course is associated with.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating which user is taking the course.

category_id.description: Foreign key referencing the categories table, indicating the category of the course.

start_date.description: Date when the user started the course.

end_date.description: Date when the user completed the course.

status.description: Current status of the course (e.g., In Progress, Completed, Not Started)

progress.description: Percentage of the course completed by the user.

created_date.description: Date and time when the record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

competency_assessments.description: Junction table linking competencies, assessments, users, tasks, and training modules, tracking assessment results for specific competencies and users in relation to tasks and training.

assessment_id.description: Foreign key referencing the assessments table, part of the composite primary key.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, part of the composite primary key.

task_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tasks table, part of the composite primary key.

training_module_id.description: Foreign key referencing the training_modules table, part of the composite primary key.

competency_id.description: Foreign key referencing the competencies table.

score.description: The score achieved on the assessment for the specific competency.

status.description: The status of the assessment (e.g., 'completed', 'pending', 'failed').

notes.description: Any notes or comments related to the assessment.

created_date.description: Date and time when the assessment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the assessment record was last updated.

contact_social_links.description: Stores social media links associated with contacts.

contact_social_link_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact social link entry.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

social_media_profile_id.description: Foreign key referencing the social_media_profiles table.

profile_url.description: URL to the contact's social media profile.

created_date.description: Date and time when the social media link was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the social media link was last updated.

user_login_logs.description: Stores logs of user login activities, including timestamps, IP addresses, and login status.

user_login_log_id.description: Unique identifier for each login log entry

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table

logout_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the logout event. Can be NULL if the user is still logged in.

ip_address.description: IP address from which the login attempt originated

login_successful.description: Boolean indicating whether the login attempt was successful

user_agent.description: User agent string of the browser used for login

created_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was last updated

customer_lifetime_value.description: Stores the calculated customer lifetime value (CLTV) for each customer, based on historical data and predictive models.

cltv_id.description: Unique identifier for each customer lifetime value record

customer_id.description: Foreign key to the customers table

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

prediction_date.description: The date when the CLTV was predicted

model_used.description: The name of the model used to predict the CLTV

segment_id.description: Foreign key to the customer_segments table, representing the segment the customer belongs to.

created_date.description: Date and time when the CLTV record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the CLTV record was last updated

social_media_profiles.description: Stores social media profile information for contacts and companies, including platform, profile URL, and associated IDs.

social_media_profile_id.description: Unique identifier for each social media profile

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table, linking the profile to a specific contact.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the companies table, linking the profile to a specific company.

platform.description: The social media platform (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn)

profile_url.description: The URL of the social media profile.

username.description: The username or handle used on the social media platform.

created_date.description: Date and time when the social media profile was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the social media profile was last updated

crm_usage_metrics.description: Tracks usage metrics within the CRM system, such as login frequency, feature usage, and data access patterns. This table provides insights into how users interact with the CRM, enabling optimization and improved user experience.

metric_id.description: Unique identifier for each usage metric record

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user associated with this metric

login_count.description: Number of times the user logged into the CRM within a specific period

feature_usage.description: JSON blob storing the frequency of usage for different CRM features

data_accessed.description: JSON blob storing information about the type and amount of data accessed by the user

time_spent.description: Total time spent by the user within the CRM system during a specific period in seconds

metric_date.description: The date for which the usage metric is recorded

created_date.description: Date and time when the metric was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the metric was last updated

third_party_integrations.description: Stores information about third-party integrations configured for each user and account within the CRM system. This table links users and accounts to specific integrations and stores integration-specific settings.

integration_id.description: Unique identifier for the integration configuration.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating which user configured the integration.

account_id.description: Foreign key to the accounts table, indicating which account the integration is configured for.

api_key.description: API key or authentication token required to access the third-party service.

settings.description: JSON blob storing integration-specific settings and configurations.

status.description: Status of the integration (e.g., 'active', 'inactive', 'pending').

created_date.description: Date and time when the integration configuration was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the integration configuration was last updated.

multi_factor_auth.description: Stores multi-factor authentication information for users, including the type of authentication method and the secret key.

mfa_id.description: Unique identifier for each multi-factor authentication entry

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table

secret_key.description: Secret key used for multi-factor authentication

is_active.description: Indicates whether multi-factor authentication is active for the user

created_date.description: Date and time when the MFA was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the MFA was last updated

user_behavior_logs.description: Stores logs of user activities and behavior within the CRM system for auditing, analysis, and reporting.

log_id.description: Unique identifier for each user behavior log entry.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating which user performed the action.

activity_type.description: Categorizes the type of user activity (e.g., login, record creation, update, deletion).

activity_details.description: Detailed information about the activity, stored as a JSON object.  Includes specifics about the action performed.

ip_address.description: The IP address from which the user initiated the activity.

user_agent.description: The user agent string of the user's browser or application.

session_id.description: The session ID associated with the user's activity.

log_time.description: Timestamp of when the activity was logged.

created_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was last updated.

team_productivity_metrics.description: Stores productivity metrics for teams, enabling performance tracking and analysis.

metric_id.description: Unique identifier for each productivity metric record

team_id.description: Foreign key referencing the team to which the metric belongs

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user to whom the metric belongs

metric_date.description: Date for which the metric is recorded

tasks_completed.description: Number of tasks completed by the team on the metric date

meetings_attended.description: Number of meetings attended by the team on the metric date

emails_sent.description: Number of emails sent by the team on the metric date

average_response_time.description: Average response time of the team in seconds

customer_satisfaction_score.description: Customer satisfaction score for the team on the metric date

created_date.description: Date and time when the metric was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the metric was last updated
